loginPage.pleaseSignIn: Please sign in to access to your portal.
loginPage.warningDescription1: Your account does not have permission to access this portal.
loginPage.warningDescription2: This portal is exclusively for registered reseller agents.
loginPage.warningDescription3: If you believe this is an error, please contact our support team for assistance.
loginPage.editYourInformation: Edit your information in a swipe

registerPage.termsAgreement: I agree to all the terms stated above, including compliance with the program requirements, ethical conduct, and privacy policies. I confirm that I have read, understood and accept these terms, both for my application and any referrals I submit.
registerPage.successfullyRegistered: You have successfully registered as a reseller

acknowledgementPoints.bySubmitting: By submitting this form, you acknowledge and agree to the following:
acknowledgementPoints.accuracy: All information provided in this form is true, accurate and complete to the best of your knowledge.
acknowledgementPoints.verification: Admission into the program is subject to verification and approval.
acknowledgementPoints.misrepresentation: Any misrepresentation or violation of program guidelines may result in disqualification or termination of participation.
acknowledgementPoints.privacy: Your personal information will be handled securely and used solely for evaluating and facilitating the partnership.
acknowledgementPoints.terms: This submission is subject to additional terms and conditions, which will be provided upon successful onboarding.

registerPage.confirmationEmail: A confirmation email will be sent to your inbox (please check your  spam folder if necessary)

forgotPasswordDialog.communityPartnershipProgramPortal: the Community Partnership Program Reseller portal.
forgotPasswordDialog.toResetYourCredentials: To reset your login credentials, please login to lookcard.io app

notRegisteredDialog.title: Not Registered
notRegisteredDialog.noAccess: Your email is yet to registered as  lookcard.io platform user.
notRegisteredDialog.benefits: To become a reseller, you must first register for a platform account and sign up as a reseller agent,
notRegisteredDialog.callToAction: . Don't miss out—join now and maximize your earnings!

accessDeniedDialog.title: ACCESS DENIED
accessDeniedDialog.mainMessage: Your account does not have the necessary permissions to access this portal, as it is restricted to registered resellers only.
accessDeniedDialog.supportMessage: If you believe this is an error, please contact our support team for assistance.

profileWithReferralCard.copiedToClipboardDescription: Referral code has been copied to your clipboard

milestoneAchievementCard.achieveActivationsMessage: Achieve {targetUsers} successful card activations within the specified timeframe. Stay on track, hit the milestone, and maximize your earnings.

recruitAgentPage.acknowledgementItem1: I confirm that all information provided in this form is accurate and true to the best of my knowledge.
recruitAgentPage.acknowledgementItem2: I acknowledge that the person I am referring has given their consent to be contacted by Lookcard Limited regarding this program.
recruitAgentPage.acknowledgementItem3: I understand that submitting a referral does not guarantee acceptance into the program for the referred individual.
recruitAgentPage.acknowledgementItem4: I acknowledge that any benefits or rewards for this referral are subject to the referred individual meeting the program eligibility and joining requirement.
recruitAgentPage.agreementLabel: I agree to all the terms stated above, including compliance with the program requirements, ethical conduct, and privacy policies. I confirm that I understand and accept these terms for both my application and any referrals I submit.

language.title: Language

walletTransferForm.rewardWalletBalanceDescription: Transfer funds from your reward wallet to your current account wallet.

transferPage.failedToLoadData: Failed to load transfer data. Please try again later.
transferPage.successDescription: Successfully transferred {{amount}} {{currency}} to your current account wallet.
transferPage.errorDescription: There was an error processing your transfer. Please try again.
transferPage.errorGeneric: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

transferConfirmationDialog.title: Transfer to Current Account Wallet
transferConfirmationDialog.subtitle: Confirm Transfer
transferConfirmationDialog.transferMessage: You are about to transfer {{amount}} {{currency}} to your Current Account Wallet
transferConfirmationDialog.disclaimer1: Please ensure all details and amounts are correct before confirming the transaction. Once submitted, transactions cannot be reversed.
transferConfirmationDialog.disclaimer2: Transfers may be subject to delays due to network availability, processing time, or external factors beyond our control.
transferConfirmationDialog.disclaimer3: Applicable transaction fees, exchange rates, and processing charges will be displayed before confirmation (if any).
transferConfirmationDialog.disclaimer4: All transactions are encrypted for security. For added protection, please do not share your login credentials with others.
transferConfirmationDialog.disclaimer5: Lookcard Limited is not liable for incorrect details entered by the user.
transferConfirmationDialog.disclaimer6: Transactions may be reviewed in compliance with local and international anti-money laundering (AML) and counter-terrorism financing (CTF) regulations. This may lead to processing delays or cancellations.

transferSuccessDialog.title: Transfer Successful
transferSuccessDialog.description: Your transfer has been completed successfully.
